script that runs before migrations doesn''t include avatar_url.

The logs show: "‚ö†Ô∏è Skipping migrations due to broken migration chain"
This means the production database relies on fix_production_schema.py 
to add new columns.

Solution:
- Added avatar_url column definition to fix_production_schema.py
- Column spec: VARCHAR(500), nullable
- Added to users_columns_to_add list
- Updated docstrings to reflect avatar URL support

When Railway redeploys:
1. fix_production_schema.py will run first
2. It will add the avatar_url column to users table
3. Application will start successfully with all required columns
